demos.intent: I made a mistake and did a transaction to a wrong account, can I cancel?
demos.rationale: The user is asking if they can cancel a transaction that was made to the wrong account, which suggests they are looking for information on how to reverse or correct the transaction.
demos.label: cancel_transfer

demos.text: Why hasn't my transaction been completed?

demos.text: Why did the cash deposit not show up in my account?
